original: 《內政》配置有對應特性或是武力及智力較好的幕僚，對於每季城池發展增長上會有顯著的效果，當城池農業、商業、技術都到達頂峰後方可擴建。
text: "Internal Affairs" is equipped with staff with corresponding characteristics or with better military and intelligence, which will have a significant effect on the growth of the city's quarterly development. It can only be expanded when the city's agriculture, commerce, and technology have reached the peak.
